body: Please, Setsuna, please. Don't try to contact Gintaro. When u left him, u don't say any word. So just be quiet until u die. I know until now he still a simp but if he knows your disgusting past, the past with a lots of secrets u shouldn't hide from someone believe u from the bottom of their heart like Gintaro, he will never trust you anymore. U had broken the promise first so u don't deserve to get his love anymore.

Which was still ok I guess since this is ntr we're talking about tho I prefer she actually would love the sensei by now instead of the guy who just confessed to her in a ntr manga cuz it make no sense if she still like the crush and follow sensei anyway. Then after sensei got arrested, she have the wits to stay away from people but now suddenly want to meet him..... God if I was him I would not even bother to talk to her. The fuck is this.

Ahh mannn!! I wished she had a happy ending with sensei more. Sensei clearly sees her as a girl and won't hesitate to give compliments. I guess the author back down and give an open ending for the boy.

It gives me the vibe that at the end, they probably met up to talk about everything that happened and get some closure. And since it was open ended enough, we can sort of imagine our own ending based on what took place. Personally, I prefer imagining that they just have a heart to heart and go their separate ways while staying friends.

@Snow Winston She gladly became the teacher's cumdump...that kind of ending would make the MC look bad. A good ending would be him already being with someone else. Maybe her confession of the fact that she was raped at first would garner some intial sympathy...but not when he remembers she continued to have sex with him enough that she got pregnant and moved away with him to start a family with him. She betrayed their childhood promise and their feelings for each other by letting herself be manipulated so easily. MC deserves a better woman with a stronger will and more respect for him and herself.

@lotrus28 lol no, just no. I mean, she didn't even report the teacher...it never stated that SHE reported him...meaning one of the other girls he raped did so. This girl was just dumb and weak-minded. Which an FMC has to be for these kind of NTR stories to "work". A strong FMC wouldn't have given into her rapist and started loving him. So far, I've only seen one NTR story with a strong willed FMC and it ends with her getting revenge on her rapists and ends up with a happy ending with her love after she tearfully explains everything to him but doesn't beg him to take her back...he forgives her on his own because she never gave in and actually was a victim the whole time.
@reg_74 Only she doesn't even act like a rape victim...especially, when meeting said rapist again.

@Bob Lee That ending would not make me feel better. Also, we don't know if MC is even willing to take her back. I mean, how would you feel if the childhood friend you loved...and claimed to love you back, ran off with an old geezer teacher and got pregnant by him. Hopefully, Gin moved on and found someone better. That's the only salvageable ending to this train-wreck and what her betrayal and idiocy deserves.

@lotrus28. That doesn't make sense either. When did she work up the courage to report the teacher? Remember, in the epilogue maybe two years have passed since the graduation. She now has the courage to do the right thing? Why didn't she report the guy at the very beginning? In my experience, people don't really change.

Nah, this girl looks perfectly fine to me.
She's not dumb, she's just a coward.

She was afraid to confront Kuroki, to confess to the boy she liked. She even didn't abort that child and left for a faraway place to never see the ppl she had used to know.
At least she had the nerve to report Kuroki although way too late.

@Bubba. Nope. It's more like the writing is bad. If you write, "Just fap to it" then I'd rather fap to porn. I read hentai to fap and to have a half-way decent storyline. Example from this story: the girl is so in love with the guy in the story that she smells his ball sweat and shit stained underwear. That's some serious love. If someone is that in love, she wouldn't forget anything he says. Later in the story she remembers he said he would protect her no matter what. If she was that in love with the guy, she would have ran to him to get him to protect him from the teacher. 

There are other plot holes, but for this entire story to work the main character has to be dumb as dogshit. If she is, how did she graduate high school? How did she keep her grades up throughout her high school when the teacher was putting her through all that?

I disagree with people who think NTR means the characters involved must be in a love relationship (husband/wife; girlfriend/boyfriend) every time, that is simply NOT true. Yes, the history of the genre many years/decades started with the old fashioned "Cuckold" basis, but with time creators began to understand that the fetish is based more around the complex feelings/effects about "taken away”, it can be a one-sided love, a person you deeply trusted/respected, even a friend (like in this game), even a goddamn sibling that can be "taken away"!! It's more about the situation where suddenly/or slowly the world around the character begins to change: persons he knew well, he normally interacted with (or NOT, just looking/secret affection) changing drastically or slowly or even not because of another man. The changes can be visible to the character, OR NOT (just to viewer). It's all about the emotional impact that another man/men makes in the character's normal world.
This is NOT netorare, she even dated Gin, she just desapear from his scoope and have the baby far away, if women have an affair or have sex is not NTR.....

Of course if there was another chapter and in that chapter Gin and setsuna would have met up with each other after so long and talk for awhile before moving on to the serious conversation about how she was blackmailed into having sex with her teacher and after that got pregnant with  his child and moved away with after he got transferred, not long after that figured out that the teacher was doing the same thing with girls and she will start crying after  saying that and i'm so sorry I should have noticed it before but I was too dumb to realize it and that I love for the longest time and he will hug her and say you do not have to worry anymore I will protect you just like I promised years ago, then kiss and have sex and after they smile and look into each other's eyes. The end.

So let me get this straight. The only time she figured out that teacher was a complete A-hole was when she graduated and followed him and to find out he was doing the same thing with other girls? She should have figured that out when he first blackmailed her. She love Ginta but was too afraid to tell him and continue with less than delicate affair. She  said she assumed he was no good for a long time and yet did those things with him despite that fact. It would have been enough to assume and do not follow him after graduation, of course he got pregnant but does not  mean he loves you and definitely does not mean go with him just because of that. Infatuation... that is laughable it was just pure lust that dictated her feelings. but of course, logic and reason have no place in the world of the hentai. out of all the heroines in hentai, she is my least favorite because it took her so long to learn mistakes and definitely to realize she had a friend in gin, good luck trying toconvince him

Easily Yuzuki N's worst work and thats is coming from a major fan boy of hers.  I'm glad to see what has come out since this story was finished is back to what she is best known for, brother - sister incest stories.

Edit from my previous comment. I change my score to an 8/10. That prolouge made the whole experience better. I like how she is recounting the story to her friend and I gave it a whole point for a semi conclusion.

@itoy123 well the simple fact is that she made her decision without think under the baseless assumption that something that wasn't happening was happening. The amount of time between when she thought he was dating that girl and them graduating was enough so that she would have heard something about if they were dating or no. That part is not so realistic, but people do assume things alot so that I'm kinda OK with. Her one in only idiotic move imo is that she got caught. She should have waited to do that when she got home, hell even steal what she wanted would have been better, but I digress. For a NTR I'll give it a 6/10. As far as stupid ntr heroine's go she is one of the smarter ones in a sense
@dwayne1010234  "realistic"  in a hentai manga? LOL this is an oxymoron.

Either way, hope to never encounter something like that again.

Why you followed him? *Facepalm* This girl is Dumb AF… I hope she doesn’t drag Gin into that kind of drama... So, Gin if you hear the doorbell Runnnn! XD

A sad story, Setsuna when she thought had lost the Gin for Tomoe, she tried to fill the void in his heart that is his love of Gin with sex, but she would never be really happy because only the love of Gin can fill the void in his heart She should have taken the initiative with Gin when she thought he was dating Tomoe to get him back.
If the teacher had married Setsuna, she would have been unhappy because she married a man she did not love, only to escape the emptiness of her heart in sex that would only be filled by Gin's love.
